features: MORE POWER: Steammaster Iron comes equipped with 1400 Watts of power for quicker heating
POWERFUL SHOT OF STEAM FEATURE: works horizontally or vertically for hanging garments, upholstery or drapery
SPRAY MIST FEATURE: the spray mist feature helps smooth out even the toughest wrinkles
NON-STICK SOLEPLATE: large nonstick soleplate glides smoothly across fabrics
AUTO-SHUT OFF: equipped with a 3-way motion smart auto-off feature for added safety and peace of mind
EASY AND NEAT STORAGE: 8-foot retractable cord stores neatly
LARGE TANK, NO LEAKS, NO WORRY: 250ml large water tank equipped with an Anti-Drip system for mess-free ironing
ACCURATE PRECISION: Precision tip gets in between buttons, lapels and around collars when using iron for clothes
body.description: Sunbeam 1400W Steammaster Steam Iron always gets you looking your best. The Shot of Steam feature provides an extra burst of steam to help smooth out stubborn wrinkles on both flat surfaces and vertically on hanging garments. This iron boasts a large 250ml water tank allowing for lengthy ironing sessions with an 8-foot retractable cord that allows for neat and easy storage. The Steammaster Iron offers 5 fabric settings and 3 steam select settings while the self clean button ensures the iron is always operating in top shape. The 3-Way Motion smart technology automatically shuts the iron off if left unattended or set in improper position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT STEAM IRON, GREAT BUILD, GREAT H20 CAPACITY
reviews.reviewText: The Sunbeam is a good iron that is well build. The water capacity is high and the translucent blue allows you to see the level. The dial is behind the holder and is a little awkward to dial the temperature but it is not a deal breaker. The steam shoots out well and is consistent. The unit does shut off automatically when it sits for awhile. I also like the retractable cord. HINT: Don't let the cord fly in by itself but rather guide the cord in. I can see where the retractable cord feature could fail or the cord can get tangled up if you just release the catch and allow it to retract too quickly.The surface is smooth and ironing shirts is done easily in the way the iron surface itself is designed. Overall, this is a very good iron and I hope it will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it, works well and it’s very affordable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is my second Sunbeam iron
reviews.reviewText: Left my old Sunbeam at my rental house so bought a new one for my new house. Big plate on the bottom and works well. It is on the heavy side if that bothers you, the retractable cord doesn't slide in all the way (about 6 inches hanging out on the old and new iron), and there is a little bit of droplets from the steam. And the silver on this new model looks like it might eventually peal. But I don't care because I know this one will never break/stop working. I tried another brand and the buttons got stuck on the first try. No thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This iron since I have had it has really done extraordinary work it hasn't stopped and I never unplug it until I'm totally finished the wait is great it doesn't weigh my arm down it gets hot right away. I really love the iron I really do if anything happens to this iron I'll be back to get another one thank you very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This makes ironing my Wrangler 13mwz Pro Rodeo jeans so very easy. I can't read what is written on the dials but I flip the switch on the top of the iron for steam. Then I turn the dials cluelessly until the iron is hot. The just iron the jeans out. It should be a professional Iron. No more having to use a squirt bottle with water to loosen up the material. The steam does all the work. It has a long retractable cable. Dropped on the floor twice. No damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
